benchmark_details.name: PerfGen: Automated Performance Benchmark Generation for Big Data Analytics
benchmark_details.overview: PerfGen is a tool that automatically generates inputs to reproduce desired performance symptoms in data-intensive scalable computing applications, addressing challenges in performance testing.
benchmark_details.data_type: generated input data for performance testing

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To provide a tool for automatic generation of performance testing inputs to identify performance issues in big data applications.

data.source: Automatically generated through the PerfGen framework based on specified performance symptoms.

methodology.calculation: Based on system-level performance metrics collected during the fuzzing process.
methodology.interpretation: High values indicate successful triggering of performance symptoms; low values may indicate inefficiency or failure to detect issues.
methodology.baseline_results: Compared to traditional fuzzing approaches, PerfGen achieves significant speedups in identifying performance issues.
methodology.validation: Evaluated through multiple case studies across various big data applications.
